com.github.macgregor.alexandria.flexmark

Class AlexandriaRemoteUriLinkResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.flexmark.AlexandriaRemoteUriLinkResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context.ContextAware, LinkResolver

    public class AlexandriaRemoteUriLinkResolver
extends Object
implements LinkResolver, Context.ContextAware
    Resolves relative links to their remote URI's if they exist. If a remote URI is not set yet (i.e. it hasnt been created yet) it will leave the relative URL in the final href tag. Web urls are also left alone.

      Context alexandriaContext()
      void alexandriaContext(Context context)
      boolean isValid(String linkText, String link)
      A valid relative link is: - a valid file system path - a file that exists - is not a directory - exists in the Config.metadata() This also means it needs the Alexandria Context to determine any of this.
      URI resolve(String linkText, String link)
      Resolves a relative file system link to a Config.DocumentMetadata#remoteUri() if possible, otherwise the link is left alone.

      • wants

        public boolean wants(String rawLink)
        Specified by:
        wants in interface LinkResolver

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(String linkText,
                       String link)
        A valid relative link is: - a valid file system path - a file that exists - is not a directory - exists in the Config.metadata() This also means it needs the Alexandria Context to determine any of this. If called before Context is set, it will return false.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface LinkResolver
        Parameters:
        linkText - the text part of the parsed link e.g. "some text" in [some text](./foo.md)
        link - the URL part of a parsed link, e.g. "./foo.md" in [some text](./foo.md)
        Returns:

      • resolve

        public URI resolve(String linkText,
                   String link)
            throws AlexandriaException
        Resolves a relative file system link to a Config.DocumentMetadata#remoteUri() if possible, otherwise the link is left alone. Assumes that isValid(String, String) has been called and returns true.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface LinkResolver
        Parameters:
        linkText - the text part of the parsed link e.g. "some text" in [some text](./foo.md)
        link - the URL part of a parsed link, e.g. "./foo.md" in [some text](./foo.md)
        Returns:
        URI of the Config.DocumentMetadata#remoteUri() or the original link
        Throws:
        AlexandriaException - Context hasnt been set, or the Config.DocumentMetadata#remoteUri() is malformed
